Course Content: This course introduces the basic concepts, principles, and techniques for service-oriented architectures (SOA)and Web services, specifically SOAP and RESTful web services. Primary topics include design and implementation of SOA based applications, development frameworks, service composition, data integration techniques, and deployment of service providers and consumers. Relevant topics such as web service security, cloud computing, BPM and blockchain are also covered.
